attributes.action: Legislate to make it an Offence for an Internet Service Provider to Forward Phishing emails
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To make it an Offence for an Internet Service Provider to knowingly or unknowingly forward an email phishing for bank account logon details.

Phishing emails, when successful, cost the banks and consummers millions of pounds per annum.
